name: Suhani
wishText: May you always stay this HAPPYYY! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! May your day be gr... blah blah
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But that is what everyone does :/
text4: I realised, I needed to do something
text5Content: You said you liked sweet gestures, right?
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
